ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 73
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice Idea, but all you make are Small Clay Deities. The sketches are just called Small Clay Deities. They are not named after any of the gods. Battlestaff
ygData.messageBody:
Nice Idea, but all you make are Small Clay Deities. The sketches are just
called Small Clay Deities. They are not named after any of the gods.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

From: Jeff Walker [mailto:jdw@...]
